name: Too Hot To Handle (Tien Lee)
description:
Take a step back in Too hot to handle, a game where the least annoying thing is the character's attitude. Help Red escape through various challenges to survive!

Key guide:

  • Arrow: To move
  • C: Jump | Talk
  • X: Dash | Combine arrow keys to choose direction
  • Z: Climb | Combine up arrow to climb and down arrow to climb down
